title: Timor-Leste urged to look beyond natural resources to drive jobs growth
description: With a median age of just 20, Timor-Leste is one of the youngest nations in the world – but creating jobs for its youth remains a major challenge. title: Timor-Leste’s youth face tough job market as nation seeks to diversify its economy
description:
HUNGRY FOR OPPORTUNITIES

title: Retail inflation for farm workers rises to 7.37 pc in November, 7.13 pc for rural labourers
description:
Retail inflation for farm workers rose to 7.37 per cent and that for rural labourers climbed to 7.13 per cent in November, mainly due to higher prices of certain food items.

title: RBI Monetary Policy: RBI maintains status quo in policy rate for 5th time now
description:
The Monetary Policy Committee of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) in its December review meeting unanimously decided to keep the policy repo rate unchanged at 6.5 per cent, thus maintaining status quo for the fifth straight time.

title: President Droupadi Murmu receives Timor-Leste’s highest civilian honour
